pageTitle: Prime Minister Justin Trudeau meets with India's Minister of External Affairs Sushma Swaraj | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Prime Minister Justin Trudeau met today with India's Minister of External Affairs, Sushma Swaraj. He was joined in the meeting by the Honourable Chrystia Freeland, Minister of Foreign Affairs. 

The Prime Minister congratulated the Foreign Ministers on their positive and wide-ranging dialogue the previous day, underscoring the importance of continued cooperation to constructively address issues of mutual concern. 

Prime Minister Trudeau discussed his engagements in India over the week, including with women business leaders and various Chief Ministers.

The Prime Minister and the Minister of External Affairs exchanged views on global issues ranging from peace and security, the situation in Myanmar and working collaboratively in multilateral forums.
